name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering scalable applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres**, with extensive hands-on expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, **Next.js**, and**Vue**. Demonstrated ability to implement CI/CD pipelines using **GitLab** and deploy systems on **AWS** utilizing **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and **Docker** for consistent development environments. 
Strong background in building microservices, event-driven architectures, and AI/ML solutions that enhance predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning projects with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Well-versed in MLOps practices, including model training and orchestration.
